name: Dormant Atlantis
description:
The Dormant Atlantis is a rogue-like game, where you have to fight fishes, eels and sharks. You also    have   to   collect treasures at the same time   in a randomly generated map. And you must do it quickly as well because you have limited oxigen.   However, you shouldn't  just take the first treasure you find, because  thoose can slow you down with their weight, and also when you take a treasure, the guardians of Atlantis will wake up, and try to kill you.

You can move with the wasd keys.
You can attack with the left click.
With the left click, you can also pick up loots, open chests and buy things in the shop.
You can dash with the right click.
You can  open inventory, exit inventory, and exit chests with the e key.
You can skip the text in the beginning of the game with space.

You can leave Atlantis in the 'exit' door however, if you don't have enough money to  give pay to your team, you will lose. At the 1st turn, you have to collect 70 coins, but it will increase. The bonus money you collected can be used to buy equipment, or you can just save it, because maybe you won't collect enough money in a later turn.

To win the game, you have to stole the real treasure of Atlantis, the giant trident.
